name: Bunny Bop!
description:
Controls

Spacebar: End turn

Left click: Select card

WASD: Use card action

Backspace: Discard selected card to draw a new one (Costs 1 Carrot)

Escape: Deselect card

R: Reset level

-----------------------------------------------

In this dungeon crawler, play cards and spend carrots to use your controls. Carefully strategize your actions to avoid and defeat mutant plants while you explore this long forgotten dungeon!

-----------------------------------------------

BG Music: https://nicolemariet.itch.io/spy-8-bit-16-bit

GitHub: https://github.com/kylengelmann/GMTK2020

Submission for GMTK 2020
